create.help: /votesign create <session name> - create a new session with the given name

error.vpexists: §cThe session with that name already exists!

addscore.help: /votesign addscore <session name> <score> <limit> [permission] - create a vote score limit for the given session and permission if provided

open.help: /votesign open <session name> - re-open a closed session

close.help: /votesign close <session name> - close an opened session

vote.help: /votesign vote <session name> <votepoint name> <score> - vote to a given votepoint with a provided score

error.reachedlimit: §cYou can't vote anymore with that score!
error.alreadyvoted: §cYou have already voted to this votepoint.

error.onlyforplayers: §cThis command can only be run by players.
